issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: branch-2 native compilation broken in hadoop-yarn-server-nodemanager

comments.body:
YARN-5719 does not exist in branch-2. Should it be cherry-picked into branch-2?
It can potentially fix the issue.

This message was automatically generated.
[~leftnoteasy], cherry-picked YARN-5719 into branch-2. One more issue in code seems to be that we calculate strlen on every iteration of for loop, which would be suboptimal.

[~varun_saxena], thanks for cherry-picking YARN-5719, as mentioned by Jason, I just pushed YARN-7014 to branch-2 as well. 

The strlen issue is fixed by YARN-6852 in trunk, probably we can add a separate fix as well.
